_meta.description: EVE Online standings requirements for agents, missions, and content access
_meta.notes: Standings are modified by Connections and Diplomacy skills. Derived standings use the higher of faction or corp standing.

2.description: Requires 1.0 effective standing with faction or corporation
2.notes: Achievable from a few L1 missions

3.description: Requires 3.0 effective standing with faction or corporation
3.notes: Significant mission grinding or storyline missions

4.description: Requires 5.0 effective standing with faction or corporation
4.notes: Major time investment. Storyline missions help significantly.

5.description: Requires 7.0 effective standing with faction or corporation
5.notes: Very high requirement. COSMOS/epic arcs recommended.

security.description: Kill missions against NPC pirates or enemy factions
security.notes: Most common agent type for combat pilots

distribution.notes: Fast standing gains, low risk. Good for industrialists.

mining.description: Mine ore and deliver to station
mining.notes: Slow but provides ore. Less common.

research.notes: Requires Science skills. Standing determines RP/day.

connections_skill.effect: +4% per level to effective standing (positive standings only)

diplomacy_skill.effect: +4% per level to effective standing (negative standings only)
diplomacy_skill.notes: Only applies when raw standing is negative

derived_standings_formula.notes: Effective standing is what matters for agent access. Train Connections V for mission runners.

storyline_mission.frequency: Every 16 regular missions of same level for same faction

epic_arc.faction: Large gain to chosen faction (10% of remaining)
epic_arc.notes: No derived losses to enemy factions

data_center.notes: Requires pirate tags. Good early boost.

jump_clone_installation.description: Install jump clone at NPC station

locator_agent.description: Locate players anywhere in New Eden

faction_warfare.notes: Cannot enlist if standing is below 0.0

empire_highsec.description: Below -5.0 faction standing = attacked by faction navy in their space
empire_highsec.notes: Can still use gates, just chased by NPCs

derived_standing_losses.description: Killing enemy faction NPCs or running missions against them causes standing losses
derived_standing_losses.pirate_missions: Killing empire NPCs causes faction standing loss with that empire
derived_standing_losses.empire_missions: Missions against pirates don't cause pirate faction loss
derived_standing_losses.faction_crossfire: Killing Gallente NPCs hurts Minmatar standing (allied factions)
derived_standing_losses.notes: Epic arcs avoid derived losses - use them for hostile faction repair

epic_arc.method: Run faction's epic arc, choose their faction at end
epic_arc.notes: Best option for repairing hostile faction standings

career_agents.method: Run career agents for target faction
career_agents.requirements: Can only do once per career agent

diplomacy_skill.standing_gain: Improves effective standing for negative values
diplomacy_skill.notes: Doesn't change raw standing, just derived

faction_warfare.method: Enlist with allied faction and run FW missions
faction_warfare.standing_gain: LP can buy faction standing boosters
faction_warfare.notes: FW standings are separate from regular standings
